data.what_is: Market faster and sell more with drag-and-drop marketing automation.
data.product_description: Market faster and sell more with drag-and-drop marketing automation.

initial_reviews.review_title: Super powerful tool for all things sales, marketing & automation related
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about InfinityFlow.io?
The thing I liked the most is that most of the tools that any entrepreneur could need are found together in one place

What do you dislike about InfinityFlow.io?
it still needs videos to explain and simplify everything to make it easier to use

What problems is InfinityFlow.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending emails, arranging them together, and the method of linking them with the rest of the tools is very distinctive and facilitates the work

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about InfinityFlow.io?
review_question_answers.answer: The thing I liked the most is that most of the tools that any entrepreneur could need are found together in one place

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about InfinityFlow.io?
review_question_answers.answer: it still needs videos to explain and simplify everything to make it easier to use

review_question_answers.question: What problems is InfinityFlow.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Sending emails, arranging them together, and the method of linking them with the rest of the tools is very distinctive and facilitates the work

initial_reviews.review_title: Infinitely Automate your business and marketing flows
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about InfinityFlow.io?
It's complete with everything you need to run and market your business. They have created an easy-to-follow onboarding process which was great for my team. I like that it is complete, and start using out of the box. It's light, super fast and features beyond our current needs.

What do you dislike about InfinityFlow.io?
To be honest, I have not found anything I don't like about it yet.

What problems is InfinityFlow.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
A complete solution that has everything we need as we grow. So we have been able to stop subscriptions of multiple tools and go all in with InfinityFlow.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about InfinityFlow.io?
review_question_answers.answer: It's complete with everything you need to run and market your business. They have created an easy-to-follow onboarding process which was great for my team. I like that it is complete, and start using out of the box. It's light, super fast and features beyond our current needs.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about InfinityFlow.io?
review_question_answers.answer: To be honest, I have not found anything I don't like about it yet.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is InfinityFlow.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: A complete solution that has everything we need as we grow. So we have been able to stop subscriptions of multiple tools and go all in with InfinityFlow.

initial_reviews.review_title: High end backend automation for businesses
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about InfinityFlow.io?
I like the fact that it is a complete solution. I like how it has the ability to drag and drop the elements together to create a form. It also has the ability to make sure it works for any business, and it is very easy to understand how to use.

What do you dislike about InfinityFlow.io?
I really don't like the UI, Its still like very basic. Some intuitive UI/UX will be good.

What problems is InfinityFlow.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are a small start-up, and I wanted to have all our processes automated with the least amount of hassle as possible. With InfinityFlow, I'm able to do that, and I can save a lot of time and energy doing this manually. I also get an awesome tool to create landing pages and forms.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about InfinityFlow.io?
review_question_answers.answer: I like the fact that it is a complete solution. I like how it has the ability to drag and drop the elements together to create a form. It also has the ability to make sure it works for any business, and it is very easy to understand how to use.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about InfinityFlow.io?
review_question_answers.answer: I really don't like the UI, Its still like very basic. Some intuitive UI/UX will be good.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is InfinityFlow.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We are a small start-up, and I wanted to have all our processes automated with the least amount of hassle as possible. With InfinityFlow, I'm able to do that, and I can save a lot of time and energy doing this manually. I also get an awesome tool to create landing pages and forms.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about InfinityFlow.io?
The site speed is ridiculously fast, and the internal automation suite makes it a proper "full marketing suite" for WAY less than something like Hubspot.  For 90% of us Infinity Flow can do everything we need, and it does it very well.

What do you dislike about InfinityFlow.io?
The only thing that InfinityFlow doesnt have yet is the blogging function. It is on the roadmap and should be done soon, but aside from that it has been excellent.

What problems is InfinityFlow.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am currently using it to rapidly deploy different pages for lead gen.  Infinity Flow is VERY suited for that. It can replace CF or GHL for almost anyone.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about InfinityFlow.io?
review_question_answers.answer: The site speed is ridiculously fast, and the internal automation suite makes it a proper "full marketing suite" for WAY less than something like Hubspot.  For 90% of us Infinity Flow can do everything we need, and it does it very well.

review_question_answers.answer: The only thing that InfinityFlow doesnt have yet is the blogging function. It is on the roadmap and should be done soon, but aside from that it has been excellent.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is InfinityFlow.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I am currently using it to rapidly deploy different pages for lead gen.  Infinity Flow is VERY suited for that. It can replace CF or GHL for almost anyone.
